a-form/form.description:
Decorated by Form.create() will be automatically set this.form property, so just pass to form.
If you use the template syntax, you can use this.$form.createForm(this, options)

a-form/hideRequiredMark.description: Hide required mark of all form items

a-form/labelCol.description: The layout of label. You can set span offset to something like {span: 3, offset: 12} or sm: {span: 3, offset: 12} same as with <Col>

a-form/wrapperCol.description: The layout for input controls, same as labelCol

a-form/autoFormCreate.description:
Automate Form.create, Recommended for use under the template component, and cannot be used with Form.create().
You should use $form.createForm to instead it after 1.1.9.

a-form/options.description: The options corresponding to Form.create(options). You should use $form.createForm to instead it after 1.1.9.
